select materials_id, materials_name, SUM(inventory)/1000 inventory from materials_mr_coal_day_stock a
stat_date = #{startDate}
stat_date = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY materials_id,materials_name

select c.materials_name,a.inventory,a.turnover_rate,a.warehousing_volume from ( select a.sort,a.materials_id,a.inventory, case when b.material_weight = 0 or b.material_weight is null then a.inventory else round(a.inventory / b.material_weight,1) end as turnover_rate, case when c.warehousing_volume is null then 0 else c.warehousing_volume end as warehousing_volume from ( select 1 as sort,a.materials_id,sum(a.inventory) as inventory from materials_mr_coal_stock a group by a.materials_id ) as a LEFT JOIN ( select a.material_number,a.material_weight from t_production_conveying_coal_performance a INNER JOIN ( select id,material_number,max(end_time) as end_time from t_production_conveying_coal_performance where end_time is not null group by id,material_number ) b ON a.id=b.id ) b ON a.materials_id = b.material_number LEFT JOIN ( select b.id as materials_id,sum(a.net_wgt) as warehousing_volume from materials_mr_storage a INNER JOIN materials_mr_code b ON a.mtrl_no = b.materials_code where TO_DAYS(a.create_time) = TO_DAYS(now()) group by b.id ) as c ON a.materials_id = c.materials_id union all select a.sort,a.materials_id,a.inventory,0 as turnover_rate, case when c.warehousing_volume is null then 0 else c.warehousing_volume end as warehousing_volume from ( select 2 as sort,a.materials_id,sum(a.inventory) as inventory from materials_mr_coke_stock a group by a.materials_id ) as a LEFT JOIN ( select b.id as materials_id,sum(a.material_weight) as warehousing_volume from t_production_coke_records a INNER JOIN materials_mr_code b ON a.material_code = b.materials_code where TO_DAYS(a.class_end_time) = TO_DAYS(now()) group by b.id ) as c ON a.materials_id = c.materials_id ) as a INNER JOIN materials_mr_code c ON a.materials_id = c.id order by a.sort
